services.title: Security & Concierge
services.description: Beyond the vehicle, we provide comprehensive support that ensures every aspect of your journey is handled with precision and discretion. Our services are designed to integrate seamlessly with your existing security protocols.

process.description: Our engagement process is designed for discretion and efficiency, ensuring your requirements are met with the utmost precision.

steps.title: Initial Consultation

steps.title: Security Assessment
steps.description: Our team evaluates routes, venues, and potential considerations to recommend the optimal solution.

steps.title: Fleet Assignment
steps.description: Selection of appropriate vehicles and personnel matched to your protection profile.

steps.title: Operational Execution
steps.description: Seamless service delivery with real-time monitoring and 24/7 support throughout your engagement.

worldCup.title: Tournament-Ready Operations
worldCup.description: For FIFA World Cup 2026, we offer enhanced services specifically designed for the unique demands of the tournament, including multi-city coordination, stadium logistics, and heightened security protocols.
features: Pre-event route reconnaissance for all venues

earlyBooking.title: Secure Your Fleet Now
earlyBooking.description: With limited armored vehicle availability in Mexico during the World Cup, early reservation ensures access to our premium fleet and preferred vehicle selection.
benefits: Locked-in rates with no tournament surge

cta.description: Contact us to discuss your World Cup 2026 requirements. Our team specializes in high-profile event logistics.

contact.title: Private Request
contact.description: Every inquiry is handled with absolute discretion. Your information is protected by strict confidentiality protocols and is never shared with third parties.

urgent.title: Urgent Requirements
urgent.description: For immediate assistance or time-sensitive requests, contact our 24/7 operations center directly.

form.title: Request Details
form.specialRequirementsPlaceholder: Any specific requirements, security considerations, or questions...

questions.q: How quickly can you arrange a vehicle?
questions.a: Standard bookings require 48-72 hours notice. For urgent requirements, contact our operations center directly for same-day availability.
All vehicles are certified to international ballistic standards (VR4-VR7) by recognized testing laboratories. Documentation available upon request.

questions.q: Do you operate outside the listed cities?
questions.a: Yes, we can arrange service throughout Mexico with advance notice. Contact us for custom logistics solutions.

questions.q: Can I request a specific driver?
questions.a: For extended engagements, we match drivers to clients based on language, experience, and compatibility. Specific requests can be accommodated.

items.title: Absolute Discretion
items.description: Your privacy is our highest priority
